about_the_game:
Survive the invasion of endless hordes of monsters together with friends online! Level up, acquire new powers and overcome the bosses to in this cooperative action roguelike!

PLAY ONLINE WITH FRIENDS

Create a room to join with up to three friends online (or join a public room) to collaborate and survive together in this adventure. Local coop is also supported.

UNIQUE BUILDS

Select different upgrades and discover unique builds for each character and each match.

EACH MAGE HAS UNIQUE SPELLS

Every mage has unique attributes, spells and a very different playstyle. Test different combinations with you friends to make the best party configurations.

FIGHT DIFFERENT BOSSES

Encounter different Bosses and Minibosses during each run, having to adapt and find the best ways to defeat them.

MYSTERIES AWAIT

Leave no stone unturned to find secret bosses, areas and unlockable characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or superior
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon X600 XT or GeForce 6800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Join friends online to survive endless hordes of monsters in this online coop "survivors" game! Evolve your spells, defeat bosses and develop the best character builds and party formations. Cooperation is key to survive in this action roguelike with unique characters.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
